argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummulg.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsummulg.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsummulg.t | |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | gsummulg.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 5 |  | gsummulg.f | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | gsummulg.w | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) finSupp .0. ) |
| 7 |  | gsummulgz.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) |
| 8 |  | gsummulgz.n | |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ablcmn | |- ( G e. Abel -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 11 | 7 | #P_orcd | |- ( ph -> ( G e. Abel \/ N e. NN0 ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 10, 8, 11 | #P_gsummulglem | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> ( N .x. X ) ) ) = ( N .x. ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) ) ) |
